statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (10,-3) and (11,-6).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{6}-{\left(-{3}\right)}}}{{{11}-{\left({10}\right)}}}=-\frac{{3}}{{1}} which reduces to \displaystyle-{3} (if it's not already reduced)
